question:
####[UFAQ 23](https://ancur.wikia.com/wiki/Whispers_in_Nalubaale_UFAQ) [Michael Boggs]
What is the additional cost to rez Masvingo incurred by [Hernando Cortez](/en/card/11004)?
answer: No matter how many advancement tokens are on Masvingo, Hernando Cortez does not add any additional cost to rez it. Masvingo's ability is not active until rezzed.
